pt.ist.fenixframework.messaging
Interface MessagingQueue

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMessagingQueue, LocalMessagingQueue, RemoteMessagingQueue
public interface MessagingQueue

Locality Aware Request Dispatcher interface. This interface is BackEnd dependent and each backend should provide an implementation.

Since:
2.8-cloudtm
Author:
Pedro Ruivo

          Initializes this queue.

Method Detail

init

void init()
          throws Exception
Initializes this queue.

Throws:
Exception

sendRequest

Object sendRequest(String data,
                   String localityHint,
                   boolean sync,
                   boolean write)
                   throws Exception
Sends a request to the node that contains the .

Parameters:
data - The request to be sent.
localityHint - The locality hint to find the node who has it. If it is null, then the underline implementation can dispatch the request to any node.
sync - If true the invocation will block until the reply is received. Otherwise, the reply is ignored and the invocation returns immediately.
write - true if the request can write, false otherwise.
Returns:
The reply if the request is Synchronous, null otherwise.
Throws:
Exception - If some exception has occurred during the request dispatcher.

shutdown

void shutdown()
Shutdowns this queue.

printLocationInfo

Map<String,String> printLocationInfo(Collection<String> localityHintsList)
Parameters:
localityHintsList - the locality hint list
Returns:
a map with the owner and the locality hints;
